name: @ni/nimble-blazor
description: Blazor components for the NI Nimble Design System

scripts.build: npm run generate-icons && npm run build:release && npm run build:client
scripts.generate-icons: npm run generate-icons:bundle && npm run generate-icons:run
scripts.lint: npm run lint:cs && npm run lint:js
scripts.format: npm run format:cs && npm run format:js
scripts.pack: cross-env-shell dotnet pack NimbleBlazor -c Release -p:PackageVersion=$npm_package_version --output dist
scripts.invoke-publish: npm run invoke-publish:nuget && npm run invoke-publish:npm --
scripts.invoke-publish:npm: echo "noop command to swallow npm args"
